procedures.name: Informed Consent
procedures.label: Informed Consent
procedures.description: Process of obtaining informed consent from the subject prior to any study-related procedures

procedures.name: Physical Examination
procedures.label: Physical Exam
procedures.description: Physical examination of the subject at baseline

procedures.name: Transesophageal Echocardiogram
procedures.label: TEE
procedures.description: Pre-procedure transesophageal echocardiogram required for subjects presenting in atrial fibrillation to confirm the absence of LA or LV thrombus

code.decode: Echocardiography, transesophageal, real-time with image documentation

procedures.name: CT Scan
procedures.label: CT Scan
procedures.description: CT scan taken within the last year, recommended for first 3 subjects at minimum for each implanter

procedures.name: MRI Scan
procedures.label: MRI
procedures.description: MRI scan taken within the last year as alternative to CT scan

procedures.name: Fluoroscopy During Tunneling
procedures.label: Fluoroscopy Tunneling
procedures.description: Fluoroscopy recordings during the tunneling procedure for lead placement

procedures.name: Fluoroscopy Final Position
procedures.label: Fluoroscopy AP/Lateral
procedures.description: Fluoroscopy (AP and Lateral cine) of final ICD generator and lead position

procedures.name: Sensing Testing
procedures.label: Sensing Test
procedures.description: Electrical sensing testing of the EV ICD System

procedures.name: Impedance Testing
procedures.label: Impedance Test
procedures.description: Electrical impedance testing of the EV ICD System

procedures.name: Pacing Testing
procedures.label: Pacing Test
procedures.description: Pacing testing of the EV ICD System

procedures.name: Defibrillation Testing
procedures.label: DFT
procedures.description: Induction and defibrillation testing to evaluate EV ICD System efficacy at implant

code.decode: Electrophysiologic evaluation of cardioverter-defibrillator with induction of arrhythmia

procedures.name: Chest Radiograph
procedures.label: Chest X-ray PA/Lateral
procedures.description: Chest radiographs (PA/Lateral) at baseline and pre-hospital discharge

procedures.name: Echocardiography
procedures.label: Echo
procedures.description: Echocardiographic data within the last 6 months at baseline

procedures.name: EV ICD Implant Procedure
procedures.label: EV ICD Implant
procedures.description: Complete implant procedure including access into anterior mediastinum, substernal tunneling, lead anchoring, transverse tunneling to device pocket, and device pocket creation

code.decode: Insertion or replacement of permanent implantable defibrillator system

procedures.name: Substernal Tunneling
procedures.label: Zone 1 Tunneling
procedures.description: Tunneling procedure for lead placement in the substernal space (Zone 1)

procedures.name: Transverse Tunneling
procedures.label: Zone 2 Tunneling
procedures.description: Transverse tunneling to deliver the proximal portion of the extravascular lead to the device pocket (Zone 2)

procedures.name: Device Pocket Creation
procedures.label: Pocket Creation
procedures.description: Creation of device pocket for ICD generator placement

procedures.name: SF-12 Quality of Life Survey
procedures.label: SF-12
procedures.description: SF-12 quality of life survey administered at baseline and 6 months

procedures.name: Pregnancy Test
procedures.label: Pregnancy Test
procedures.description: Pregnancy test within seven days prior to EV ICD Japan Study procedure for women of child-bearing potential

procedures.name: Subject Pre-implant Anatomy Evaluation
procedures.label: Anatomy Evaluation
procedures.description: Pre-implant evaluation of subject anatomy

procedures.name: System Modification
procedures.label: System Mod
procedures.description: System modification procedure where a subject leaves the procedure with an EV ICD System including repositioning, replacement, or explant

procedures.name: Incision Photography
procedures.label: Incision Photo
procedures.description: Collection of incision photographs if an infection related to the EV ICD System is suspected

medicalDevices.name: EV ICD System
medicalDevices.label: Extravascular Implantable Cardioverter Defibrillator System
medicalDevices.description: Complete single-chamber extravascular ICD system with the lead implanted substernally for automated treatment of life-threatening ventricular tachyarrhythmias

medicalDevices.name: EV ICD Lead
medicalDevices.label: Extravascular Lead
medicalDevices.description: Lead designed specifically for the substernal space for pacing, sensing, and defibrillation

medicalDevices.name: Sternal Tunneling Tool
medicalDevices.label: Sternal Tunneling Tool
medicalDevices.description: Investigational tool for substernal tunneling during EV ICD implant procedure

medicalDevices.name: Transverse Tunneling Tool
medicalDevices.label: Transverse Tunneling Tool
medicalDevices.description: Investigational tool designed to deliver the proximal portion of an extravascular lead to the device pocket during implant of an extravascular implantable device system (Zone 2)

medicalDevices.name: SafeSheath II Introducer
medicalDevices.label: SafeSheath
medicalDevices.description: Hemostatic tear-away introducer for introduction of pacing leads and catheters with infusion side port for injection or aspiration

medicalDevices.name: 10cc Plastic Syringe
medicalDevices.label: Syringe
medicalDevices.description: 10cc plastic syringe packaged with the introducer sheath

medicalDevices.name: MyCareLink Patient Monitor
medicalDevices.label: MyCareLink
medicalDevices.description: Patient monitor for remote monitoring of the EV ICD System

medicalDevices.name: Fluoroscope
medicalDevices.label: Fluoroscope
medicalDevices.description: Imaging equipment for fluoroscopy during implant procedure, must support full (90Â°) lateral fluoroscopy (biplane preferred)

medicalDevices.name: Programmer Software
medicalDevices.label: Software
medicalDevices.description: Software for programming and interrogating the EV ICD System
